biography: Ricke, a name whispered with a mix of respect and regret in the golfing circles of the Hector Trophée, is a figure of undeniable presence, despite his recent retirement from the event. While the fairways of his home club remain shrouded in mystery, his performances in the Hector Trophée have left an indelible mark.

A competitor in 2 previous iterations of the Hector Trophée, Ricke, while never seizing the ultimate victory of the Hector Trophée nor claiming the individual Victor Trophy, brought a unique blend of intensity and contemplation to the game. Known for his meticulous pre-shot routines and his habit of conversing with his golf clubs, Ricke always provided a memorable presence. His strategic mind, often seen mapping out courses in his mind's eye, was as captivating as it was effective.
Though he will not be participating in Hector Trophée 2025, fans still fondly remember Ricke's time at the tournament.
